about_the_game:
Summary

Champs TD is a typical Tower Defense Game as you know and like. Slay thousands of Minions in randomized Waves. Summon powerful Champions with 28+ unique Abilities. Earn Experience, Level Up and choose from 100+ Talents to improve your Champs just the way you want.

Replayability

Randomized Minion Waves, 4 Difficulties and 15 Maps will guarentee you hours of fun!

"This isn't even my final form."

There are 8 different Champs in the game. You can upgrade every Champ up to 16 times. Every 5 Levels your Champ will Evolve and transform itself into a more powerful being.

Slay Minions. Earn Experience. Level Up.

Gain Talent Points and use the Talent Tree to improve your favourite Champs just the way you want to. Every Stat from every Champ and every Ability can be improved!

28+ Unique Abilities

Each Champ has 4 Abilities that range from passive Poisons and Slows to powerful Area Damage Abilities like a Fire Rain. Every Champ has an Ultimate Ability. For example, the Mage can summon multiple rotating Laser Beams that melt every minion that comes in contact with them.






This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.

name: Champs TD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 - 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: ATI HD7900 series or NVIDIA equivalent.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is the lowest tested hardware that could run the game on medium settings.
